lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Jal Jalaj Au Jal Dudh Seel Meena , Chakaee Kamal Dinakari Prati Preet Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a lotus flower loves water, water has affinity for milk, fish loves water, ruddy Sheldrake and lotus love the sun;

lines.gurmukhi: dIpk pqMg Ail kml ckor sis miRg nwd bwd Gn cwqiRk su cIq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Deepak Patang Ali Kamal Chakor Sasi , Mrig Naad Baad Ghan Chaatrik Su Cheet Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: A winged insect (patanga) is attracted to the flame of the light, a black bee is crazy of the fragrance of the lotus flower, a red legged partridge is ever craving for a glimpse of the moon, a deer has affinity for music, while a rain-bird is ever alert f

lines.gurmukhi: nwir Aau Bqwru suq mwq jl qiRKwvMq KuiDAwrQI Bojn dwirdR Dn mIq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Naari Au Bhataaru Sout Maat Jal Trikhaavanta , Khudhiaaradee Bhojan Daaridr Dhan Meet Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As a wife loves her husband, a son is deeply attached with his mother, a thirsty man craves for water, a hungry for food, and a pauper is always trying to befriend wealth.

lines.gurmukhi: mwieAw moh dRoh duKdweI n shweI hoq gur isK sMiD imly qiRgun AqIq hY ]292]
lines.transliteration_english: Maaiaa Moh Droh Doukhadaaee N Sahaaee Hota , Gur Sikh Sandhi Milay Trigoun Ateet Hai ?292?

Shabad OS B.translation: But all these loves, craves, affinities are three characteristics of maya (mammon). Therefore their love is deceit and trick that causes sufferings. None of these affections stand by a person at the final hour of him life. Love of a Sikh and his Guru is b
